entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Fog patches overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
